attributes.action: Not finalise PESCO DEAL with E.U. our defense, it's systems to remain soverign.
attributes.additional_details: The British people have not either been properly informed of the total loss of our military defense. We have neither been given a vote on it either. Under our soverign laws any major issue that effects our way of life and our freedoms which this will do and our security must be voted for by the people a referendum must now occur. Which is fairly undertaken and without bias from European intervention through our press. It is a legal requirement for our government to provide this, and must occur.
attributes.background: We the people will be losing our defence by losing our Five Eyes, MI6, and Cheltenum security, will be at the mercy of the E.U. Our children will conscripted into an E.U army. . No accountabilty on E.U. OUR marines, RAF, and nuclear powers will be handed to E.U. on 1st Nov 2019. Referendum required

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The UK is not part of PESCO and would have to opt in to any cooperation. You can find out more here: https://researchbriefings.parliament.uk/ResearchBriefing/Summary/CBP-8149
	
You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
